oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sewanee View
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “‘Greens View.’ Sewanee, Tenn.” Black-and-white image of landscape.

“Miss Olive Connable -- 1020 Rainer Pl. -- Memphis -- Tenn. -- Hello Olive: -- We are having a -- perfectly lovely time -- up here. We walked -- to the edge of -- the rock that this -- picture is taken -- from. The scenery -- is simply beautiful. -- Give Abby & your -- mother my love. -- Elizabeth.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sewanee, Tennessee; landscapes;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: No specifics; says only “Printed in Germany”
